page.title: 03Three Independent Schools.
page.content: {Falkland S.Gabriel's. } {} This Independent Day school for girls has pupils from{3\ to 11.}It has a few boys in the younger forms up to about 7yrs old.It has 146 pupils and 11 teachers.Pupils come from Berkshire Hampshire and Wiltshire,by taxi,car, and bus. Subjects are English,Maths., Geog.,History,French,Drama,Art and Science.Sports are Rounders,Netball, Athletics and Swimming. Special facilities include computers and also a swimming pool,Theatre and kiln. The forty year old school prepares girls for{Common Entrance.}The school moved to new premises two years ago and now shares a site with S.Gabriel's. Winter and summer uniform of blue white and brown is worn.{Midday meal}is by a cafeteria system. Pupils go on to S.Gabriels,Downe House,Park House and S.Barts.
